page.title: 06Events in Wootton Bassett
page.content:
The{New Police Station}was opened on the 18th September 1984.It was opened by Princess Anne.
This year is the 14th{Carnival.}It lasts one week and includes the procession,fund raising events and the fair. The procession is led by the Carnival Queen and the Princess.
The{Wootton Bassett Show}comes once a year in August Bank Holiday.The Young Farmers Club and Round Table organise it.Day One is a Gymkhana.
Wootton Bassett{Town Hall}is an upper room raised on fifteen pillars.In 1984 owing to its age it was re-roofed. { {Repairing the Church Roof}.The people of Wootton Bassett raised Â£70,000.It took two years.
